query:
UPDATE storage_hosts
                SET used_storage = (
                    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(m.data_size), 0) as big_int
                    FROM storage_hosts_metadatas_storage_grants shms
                    INNER JOIN metadata AS m ON m.id = shms.metadata_id 
                    WHERE shms.storage_host_id = $1
                )
                WHERE id = $1;
